key.name: location
key.description: Which screen edge to place the panel on

key.name: size
key.description: Height of panel if horizontal, or the width if it is vertical

key.name: transparency
key.description: The transparency mode of the panel

key.name: autohide
key.description: The automatic hide policy of the panel

key.name: dock-mode
key.description: Dock mode panels are much smaller and resize to house content

key.name: enable-shadow
key.description: Whether to enable an aesthetic drop shadow for the panel

key.name: theme-regions
key.description: Whether to enable the theming of each specific panel region

key.name: applets
key.description: Configured applets for this toplevel

key.name: alignment
key.summary: Which area of the panel to use
key.description: Controls placement on a specific area of the panel: start, center or end

key.name: position
key.description: Pack index for this applet

key.name: name
key.description: Name of the provider plugin

key.name: panels
key.description: Toplevel panels

key.name: spam-apps
key.description: Notifications send by these apps will not be displayed in Raven.

key.name: spam-categories
key.description: Notifications send by apps of these categories will not be displayed in Raven.

key.name: confirm-remove-applet
key.description: Request applet removal permission from the user first

key.name: dark-theme
key.summary: Use dark theme within Budgie Desktop
key.description: Use the dark theme within Budgie, aka night mode

key.name: builtin-theme
key.description: Enable the built-in theming, or disable to let themes override it.

key.name: show-builtin-theme-option
key.summary: Show the built-in theme option for legacy support
key.description: Enabling this will show the built-in theme option for legacy theme, which is no longer fully supported.

key.name: notification-position
key.description: Set the location on the screen where notification popups will appear.

key.name: migration-level
key.description: Migration level of the current Budgie installation to permit built-in applet changes

key.name: layout
key.summary: Name of the default desktop layout
key.description: The name of the default layout used when resetting the panel
